SEARCH

类 Task

java.lang.Object
Task
public class Task extends Object
Represents a task with various attributes such as title, description, due date, and priority.

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    static enum 
    Task.TaskPriority
    Represents the priority levels for a task.
    static enum 
    Task.TaskStatus
    Represents the status of a task.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Task

      public Task(String title, String description, LocalDateTime dueDateTime, LocalDateTime reminderTime, Task.TaskPriority priority)
      Creates a new Task object.
      参数:
      title - the title of the task
      description - the description of the task
      dueDateTime - the due date and time of the task
      reminderTime - the reminder date and time for the task
      priority - the priority level of the task
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any required parameter is null
